fields.description:
https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-YARN-Build/18498/testReport/

{code}  TestNodeLabelContainerAllocation.testPreferenceOfNeedyPrioritiesUnderSameAppTowardsNodePartitions:786->checkPendingResource:557 expected:<1024> but was:<0>
  TestNodeLabelContainerAllocation.testPreferenceOfQueuesTowardsNodePartitions:985->checkPendingResource:557 expected:<5120> but was:<0>
  TestNodeLabelContainerAllocation.testQueueMetricsWithLabels:1962 expected:<0> but was:<1024>
  TestNodeLabelContainerAllocation.testQueueMetricsWithLabelsOnDefaultLabelNode:2065 expected:<1024> but was:<2048>

{code}
